ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE, SODIUM CHLORIDE, COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE, GLYCOL DISTEARATE, COCAMIDE MEA, SODIUM CITRATE, BETULA ALBA LEAF EXTRACT, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PARFUM, CITRIC ACID, 2-BROMO-2-NITROPROPANE-1,3-DIOL, LINALOOL, CI 42051, CI 47005.

product-info.opis: Brezov šampon z naravnim ekstraktom breze krepi lase in pospešuje njihovo rast. Primeren je za pogosto umivanje vseh vrst las.
